featured.text: Speaking only limited English, the Vladimirs spent five hours trying to explain their presence.
Which course (direction) did the Vladimirs take to get to Penghu? (A) East.
It is not immediately known whether the “Kawasaki” can be repaired on the fishing island of Penghu, or when the Vladimirs will be able to set off again and continue their around-the-world voyage.
What was the purpose of the voyage of the Vladimirs? (A)
What did the Vladimirs decide to do after they were rescued?

definition.zh_def: 弗拉基米尔斯，通常指代某些以弗拉基米尔命名的事物或人名。
definition.en_def: Vladimirs, typically referring to things or people named after Vladimir.
definition.example: Many cities in Eastern Europe have streets named after Vladimirs.
